sourcesContent:
import { AspectRatio, Blockquote, Box, Button, Flex, Text, Dialog, Heading, TextField, } from "@radix-ui/themes"; export default function ProductBox ({product, index}) { function changeImagePath(product) { let filePath = product.image; const imgIndex = filePath.indexOf("img"); if (imgIndex !== -1) { return filePath.substring(imgIndex); } return filePath; } return (
{product.name}
{'$' + product.unit_price}
 {product.name}
{'Price: $' + product.unit_price}
{'Units: ' +product.qty}
Quantity {product.name}
{'Price: $' + product.unit_price}
{'Units: ' +product.qty}
Description {product.description} ) }
